name: Roots Puzzle
description:
Roots Puzzle

You are a tree now.  You consume water, minerals and Co2 so you can grow leaves and roots. You grow leaves and roots, so you can consume water, minerals and Co2.

How deep do tree roots grow?  Check the 5 levels!

All code, art, sound, music was created during the jam: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/roots-puzzle

Controls: WASD + mouse
